sentences.en: a baby born at 38 weeks' gestation
Both audience and player alike were predominantly Black for that gestation period.
sentences.cn: 在蓝调音乐的萌芽时期,黑人占了艺人与听众的绝对多数.

sentences.en: Causal factors of macrosomia include maternal diabetes, postdates gestation, and obesity.
sentences.cn: 巨大儿的好发因素包括母亲糖尿病, 过期妊娠及肥胖.

sentences.en: Despite obstetric advances, pre - term birth - before 37 weeks of gestation - remains a major problem.
sentences.cn: 尽管产科学一直在发展, 早产 - 怀孕37周 - 仍然是主要的问题.

sentences.en: DNA was extracted from fetuses at mid - gestation, about 10 days past conception.
sentences.cn: DNA从受孕大约10天后的 中期 妊娠胚胎中提取.

sentences.en: Do you have the patience to withstand the gestation period?
sentences.cn: 你能承受酝酿期的耐力 吗 ?

sentences.en: Elephants have a gestation period of about 624 days.
Gestation period of emotional, development and quarrels, rescue, love the process.
sentences.cn: 一段感情的孕育 、 发展、争吵 、 拯救 、 相爱的过程.

sentences.en: Immunological recognition of pregnancy is important for the maintenance of gestation.
sentences.cn: 这种免疫识别对妊娠状态的维持起着非常重要的作用.

sentences.en: Menses first four days shoot inside on, how big gestation probability is?
sentences.cn: 月经前四天射里面, 怀孕几率多大?

sentences.en: Pigs of sows infected during gestation may develop clinical signs of HC after weaning.
sentences.cn: 怀孕期间受感染的母猪生的小猪,在断乳后发生猪瘟临床症状.

sentences.en: Results The successful rate of terminating mid - term gestation was 96.65 %.
sentences.cn: 结果米非司酮配伍米索前列醇终止 中期 妊娠成功率96.65%.

sentences.en: The gestation period can be anything between 95 and 150 days.
The gestation period of a horse is about 11 months.
sentences.cn: 马的妊娠期为11个月左右。

sentences.en: This film was two years in gestation.
Until the eighth week of gestation every human fetal brain looks female.
sentences.cn: 在怀孕的前8个星期,每个胎儿的大脑都看起来想女性的.

phrases.tran_cn: 妊娠期；怀孕期；怀孕期间

trans.tran_cn: 怀孕，怀孕期，（思想、主意等的）构思、酝酿，孕育（过程）
trans.tran_en: the process by which a new idea, piece of work etc is developed, or the period of time when this happens
